name: Coccooning For The Winter
description:
This game was made for Discord Jam 5 by Silver Lewis, JohnLee Cooper, and Austin Heller. The theme was "Mutation".  Dig around the terrain as a wacky wormboi and depending on what you eat, you will metamorph into different bugs! 

Controls:

  • wasd or control stick: move around!
  • Space or X Button: eat!
  • E or A Button: talk/confirm!
  • F or Y Button: wait (fast forward)!
  • Escape or Start: exit game!
  • M or Select: mute music!
  • Menu uses the mouse
